text: Malcolm Stevenson "Steve" Forbes Jr. (; born July 18, 1947) is an American publishing executive. He ran for the nomination of the Republican Party for President of the United States two times. Forbes is the Editor-in-Chief of Forbes. He ran in the 1996Mitt Romney to report financial assets of at least $190 million Fox News and 2000 Presidential primaries. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:1996 United States presidential candidates Category:2000 United States presidential candidates Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Morristown, New Jersey
title: Steve Forbes
